document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2019-02
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING LOCAL AMENDMENTS TO THE 2016 CALIFORNIA BUILDING STANDARDS CODE AND CALIFORNIA RESIDENTIAL CODE FOR AN ELECTRIC VEHICLE CHARGING STATION EXPEDITED/STREAMLINED PROCESS CONSISTENT WITH CALIFORNIA ASSEMBLY BILL 1236
